biotools.summary:
An R Package for Exploring and Analyzing UCSC Xena Public Datasets in Web Browser.

The goal of UCSCXenaShiny is to provide a web app for downloading, analyzing and visualizing datasets from UCSC Xena, which is a collection of UCSC-hosted public databases such as TCGA, ICGC, TARGET, GTEx, CCLE, and others. Databases are normalized so they can be combined, linked, filtered, explored and downloaded.

A Shiny App for UCSC Xena Database.

Provides a web app for downloading, analyzing and visualizing datasets from UCSC Xena (<http://xena.ucsc.edu/>), which is a collection of UCSC-hosted public databases such as TCGA, ICGC, TARGET, GTEx, CCLE, and others.
